Arri Ghent
Class: Druid
Race: Human
Rank: High Council Leader
Gender: Female
Religion: Tunare - The Mother of All
Email:
nambut@yahoo.com
I am a druid who comes from Sureglade Falls where I was brought up to protect the bears. I have no known parents. I was brought up by the community. I would love it if the world outside Surefall was as peaceful as the inner peace I find there. When I ventured from my peaceful home I became aware that it wasn't peacful at all and that there were other creatures besides the bears that needed my protection. One of these creatures being the Treants. I weep when I am in South Karana and parties gather to kill the treants. The treants provide us with the air we breath. I form groups to expell the evil from our land. I hope together we can expell the world of all of its evils. I travel extensively between Antonica and Kunark and have found the beasts vile in Kunark and my current plan is to kill anything evil in my way in Kunark.
